name: Time Dungeon (NilsB, knurrwurst)
description:
Once you were a mighty warrior. But even your time had to come sometimes. 

Luckily you you are still owned a favor from an old sorcerer. He told you that there is a world between ours and hell. If you can find the fountain of live before the rest of your time runs out you will get a second chance. 

But be wary! Your soul is weak! Better try to avoid enemies to not loose your precious enregy by attacking or tacking damage.

This game was created for the 48 Secret Jam - June 2018

Controls:

  • Movement: W,A,S,D
  • Attack: Spacebar
